title: TrueFeedback
description: TrueFeedback is a platform where users can provide anonymous feedback to individuals or organizations without revealing their identity

title: NEXT-COMMERCE
description: Developed a Full-Stack E-commerce platform with the help of NextJS, Typescript, ShadCn UI and Sanity.io. An CMS where we can store our products and integrated Stripe for managing Payment gateways

title: INSIGHTS
description: Developed a FullStack Blog application by integrating ReactJS, TailwindCSS and Appwrite for Backend as a service (BAAS) where Users can Login and Post, Edit, Read, Delete the Blogs

title: Biz-Directory
description: Developed a Business Directory app with React Native and Expo, allowing users to browse business categories and add their own listings.

title: Crypto-Arena
description: Developed the Crypto WebApp where user can access all the information related to crypto-currecies and coins, and one can see the live Chart according to the time period
